entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
